faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about investing in royalties.

questions.question: What are royalties?
questions.answer: Royalties are payments made to the owners of an asset (like a song, movie, or technology) for the right to use that asset. Revenue is generated recurrently over time.

questions.question: Is there a risk of loss?
questions.answer: Yes. As with any investment, there is a risk of capital loss. The value of returns is directly tied to the asset's performance. You should be aware of all risks before investing.

questions.question: Who can invest with Invest Prime?
questions.answer: Our offers are aimed at investors seeking diversification who understand the risks of alternative investments. Some offers may be restricted to 'Qualified Investors' as per regulations.

questions.question: How do I start investing?
questions.answer: Sign up on the platform, verify your identity, and explore the available opportunities. Our team is available to assist you.

questions.question: What are the costs involved?
questions.answer: We do not charge entry fees, but there are administration and performance costs detailed in each offer.
